meanings.definition: People who engage in the act of caning.
meanings.sent1: The caners gathered in the workshop to learn the art of caning chairs.
meanings.sent2: The caners in the village were known for their skill in crafting intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The group of caners decided to have a friendly competition to see who could cane the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like skilled caners, weaving the cane into a beautiful design.
meanings.sent5: The sound of caners at work filled the room, creating a rhythmic melody.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of can.

meanings.sent3: The cat caners around the house, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: Time caners swiftly, reminding us to cherish each moment.
meanings.sent5: The river caners gently, carrying leaves downstream with ease.
